text: Gava ewane hevriceker, ewan hevriyan dibinin (aha) dibejin: "Xudaye me! Ewan hevriyen, ku me ji pestire te ji wan ra peresti dikir, evanan in (idi tola xwe ji wan derxe, ewan em xapandibun," tokelan bersiva wan aha daye): "Bi rasti hun derewan dikin (qe tu cari me hun gazi bal perestiya xwe ne kirine)
